item.title: Episode 1: Miscommunication
item.description: -- Episode 1: Miscommunication -- "No adult is an island." "What didn't you say?" "Got any coconuts in your backyard?" -- "Boom! And you're inside the mirror." -- $(document).ready(function(){ var $el = $('#fullscreen-launch-content'); // $el.hide(); $el.css({ 'top':( $(window).height() / 2) - ($el.height() / 2) }); });

item.title: Credits
item.description: Charisma Created by Sarah M. Harrison and Wojciech Kosma starring Melissa Holley as Fin Bhalo Najmah as Asher Antoni Matteo Garcia as Howy Ricky Watson as Echo Also Featuring Lithalsa Amelia Bande Hamishi Farah Birgit Stauber Aciel Martinez Pol Associate Producer Maru Mustrieva Camera Rindon Johnson Additional Camera Jaakko Pallasvuo, Michele Majidi and the cast Art Direction & Set Design Ebba Fransén Waldhör Narrated by
